title: emacs go-mode: unusual auto-mode-alist regexp
body:
by **mstplbrg**: 
Hello,

At Debian, we got a bugreport about the regular expression which go-mode-load.el uses in
line 34: http://code.google.com/p/go/source/browse/misc/emacs/go-mode-load.el#34

Quote from our bugreport:
For the go-mode auto-mode-alist entry it's usual to write

    "\\.go\\'"

rather than

    "\\.go$"

since the latter can match a newline in the middle of a filename.  Not
that there ought to be newlines in filenames, but end-of-string is the
aim there.

To see the original bugreport, please visit:
http://bugs.debian.org/670371

This should be an easy fix.

Thanks in advance,
Best regards,
Michael
